Service Details: - Provides subsidized housing units for low-income families, seniors and persons with disabilities- 78 units dedicated to seniors- 56 units subsidized of which 13 units are dedicated to those requiring wheelchair access- 24 units are rented at market value
Eligibility: Ages: 55 year(s) and up- 55 years and up- Must be raising dependent children for family application
How to Apply: Please call our office, email, or drop into our office for an application
Address & Map: Administration Office799 Houghton Rd, Ste 123Kelowna, BC     V1X 7J9View MapQuest Map
